title: (x) Snap into a Slim Jim! - Crudfont {John B}
content:
I figured out what the Slim Jim font is... Crudfont, designed by Scott Yoshinaga in 1994.   
   
 [http://www.graphic-design.com/Type/Grunge/Crud.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20060209024644/http:/www.graphic-design.com/Type/Grunge/Crud.html)
author: glutton
